properties.characteristics: One-man operation. Opens at 6. Neighbourhood favourite. No website, word of mouth.

properties.name: Le Fournil des Récollets
properties.characteristics: Tiny local bakery. Canal area. Owner-baker. Sourdough and croissants.

properties.name: Boulangerie Dupont
properties.characteristics: Family name above the door since the 1970s. Same family, same recipes. Local regulars.

properties.name: La Miche
properties.characteristics: Small artisan shop. One baker. Big round loaves and country bread. Quiet street.

properties.name: Chez Jean-Luc
properties.characteristics: Jean-Luc runs it alone with his wife. Morning rush, then calm. Baguette tradition.

properties.name: Le Pain de Sophie
properties.characteristics: Sophie’s small bakery. Organic flour, no additives. Regulars from the block.

properties.name: Pâtisserie Chez Marie
properties.address: 5 rue de la Fontaine au Roi, 75011 Paris
properties.characteristics: Marie does everything: tarts, cakes, a few breads. Tiny shop, big heart.

properties.name: Boulangerie Bernard
properties.characteristics: Bernard and his son. Two generations. Classic baguette and campagne. No fuss.

properties.name: Le Fournil de Versailles
properties.characteristics: Local bakery near the château. Family-run. Tourists and neighbours alike.

properties.name: Chez le Père François
properties.characteristics: Traboules area. François has been baking for 40 years. Lyonnais bread and praline brioche.

properties.name: La Petite Boulangerie
properties.characteristics: Tiny shop on the hill. One baker. Croix-Rousse regulars. Pain de campagne.

properties.name: Boulangerie Michel

properties.name: Chez Mireille
properties.characteristics: Mireille’s place in Noailles. Market crowd. Fougasse and navettes. Very local.

properties.name: Le Four de la Plaine
properties.characteristics: Neighbourhood bakery. La Plaine. One owner-baker. Bread and a few pastries.

properties.name: Chez Titi
properties.characteristics: Titi’s tiny shop in Old Nice. Socca and pissaladière. Regulars from the quartier.

properties.name: Boulangerie du Marché
properties.characteristics: Stall and small shop by the flower market. Family-run. Morning bread for the market.

properties.name: Chez Pascal (Chartrons)
properties.characteristics: Different Pascal—small local in Chartrons. Canelé and baguette. Neighbourhood only.

properties.name: Le Fournil de la Victoire
properties.characteristics: Near the university. Student and local favourite. Family bakery, two generations.

properties.name: Boulangerie du Vieux-Lille

properties.name: Chez André

properties.name: Au Pain de Marguerite
properties.characteristics: Marguerite and her daughter. Petite France. Kougelhopf and baguette. Very local.

properties.name: Le Petit Four Alsacien
properties.characteristics: Tiny Alsatian bakery. Bretzel and pain. One baker. Word of mouth.

properties.name: Boulangerie Chez Hélène
properties.characteristics: Hélène’s place. Bouffay. Butter croissants and baguette. Neighbourhood regulars.

properties.name: Le Fournil Nantais

properties.name: Chez Yann

properties.name: La Boulangerie du Coin

properties.name: Boulangerie Le Gall

properties.name: Chez Pierre (Toulouse)

properties.name: Chez la Mère Michaud

properties.name: Le Four à Pain

properties.name: Boulangerie Madame Lefebvre

properties.name: Au Petit Boulanger
properties.characteristics: “The little baker.” Small shop. Rouen regulars. Simple baguette and croissant.

properties.name: Chez Claudine

properties.name: Le Four du Ventoux

properties.name: Boulangerie Klein

properties.name: Chez Marc (Reims)

properties.name: Le Fournil de la Place

properties.name: Boulangerie du Château

properties.name: Chez la Famille Martin
